column3: The Pivotal Tracker plugin does not properly set the remote story to finished when the status on the task is updated to TaskState.RESOLVED
This update handles setting a task to both started and finished in PivotalTracker
Hi, @zsiegel. Unfortunately, I missed notification about your pull request and already fixed this problem as part of 85bcbe8. Anyway, thanks for your attention to our codebase!
Updating the pivotal task state to 'finished' when task state is RESO¡­
